messages.subject: The Shinsengumi Detector!  (fantasy product)
messages.msgSnippet: rated pg-13 for sexual innuendo Written by secretarytocapt3 and Barbara Sheridan starring Hirotada Tokugawa (Shimazu Masayoshi) and secretarytocapt3 This is a
messages.messageBody:
rated pg-13 for sexual innuendo
Written by secretarytocapt3 and Barbara Sheridan
starring Hirotada Tokugawa (Shimazu Masayoshi) and secretarytocapt3

This is a spoof on how the Shinsengumi are horrible customers in the
red-light district and how Choshu extremists and other certain Tosa
thinkers are determined to evade the Shinsengumi. The character
Madame Matsu was created by Barbara Sheridan.

"The Shinsengumi Detector " BANNER
http://1happyturtle.com/Hosting/ShinsengumiDetectorBanner.jpg

The actual vid (and it's under 5 mb---best viewed on winamp)
http://1happyturtle.com/Hosting/shinsendetector.wmv

the file etc is also on http://www.shinsengumihq.com/MFD.htm
but I don't know when Youtube will put it online...it takes a while
usually.

*enjoy*
